data.eml:eml: A study of the genus Cyrtosia Perris (Diptera: Mythicomyiidae: Platypyginae) in Yazd province, Iran, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hakimian, Saeedeh, Nozari, Jamasb, Gharali, Babak, Evenhuis, Neal (2018): A study of the genus Cyrtosia Perris (Diptera: Mythicomyiidae: Platypyginae) in Yazd province, Iran, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4387 (1): 195-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4387.1.10
